name: tm35
effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sleep Talk Gen I: Metronome)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Looses a stream of
fire that may burn
the foe.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Looses a stream of
fire that may burn
the foe.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is scorched
with intense flames.
The foe may suffer
a burn.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is scorched with an intense
blast of fire. The target may also be
left with a burn.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.
It damages all Pokémon except Ice types.
